Lemon Drizzle Muffins

Makes 10

Ingredients
  • 2 eggs, beaten
  • 80g/3oz caster sugar
  • 240ml/8fl oz milk
  • 100ml vegetable oil
  • 300g/10oz plain flour
  • 3tsp/15g baking powder
  • Ð…tsp/2.5g salt
  • 4 lemons, zest
Topping:
  • 50g/2oz icing sugar
  • 1 lemon, juice
Method

  1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Line a muffin tin with paper cases. Mix the egg, sugar, milk and oil in a large bowl. Sift in the flour, baking powder, salt and then add the lemon. Roughly mix.

  2. Spoon the mixture into the pre-prepared muffin cases.

  3. Bake for 30-35 minutes until well risen and golden. Cool on a wire rack.

  4. Make the lemon drizzle topping by mixing together the sugar and lemon juice.

  5. Spoon over the cooled muffins.

Published: July 22 2012
